ratings.question_text: Overall, how would you rate the workload of this course in comparison to other Yale courses you have taken:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
What is your overall rating of the primary instructor?
The primary instructor's sensitivity to students and ability to provide students with adequate feedback was:

narratives.question_text: Indicate the total number of hours per week (outside the classroom) you spent on this course:
comments: 3 hours
5 hours.

narratives.question_text: Looking back on this course, what is your overall assessment of the course:  What are its strengths and weaknesses, and in what ways might it be improved?
comments: useful
Interesting
A very good course overall. Topics are very related to the objectives of the course on the syllabus.
The knowledge I gained in this class was extremely important. It was enjoyable and interesting.
Great course, interesting material
Very informative, very good.

narratives.question_text: Please evaluate the instructor of this course. What are the instructor's strengths and weaknesses, and in what ways might his or her teaching be improved?
comments: Instructor: Amanda Jean Durante  A-
Instructor: Amanda Jean Durante  very good
Instructor: Amanda Jean Durante  She is really knowledgable in PH surveillance
Instructor: Amanda Jean Durante  Very experienced and knowledgable in this field. Well-prepared for lectures.
Instructor: Amanda Jean Durante  Dr. Durante is a very knowledgable teacher and made the class interesting.
Instructor: Amanda Jean Durante  Great instructor, was very useful to hear the perspective of someone who is working in the public health field and who has practical experience in surveillance
Instructor: Amanda Jean Durante  Professor is very good and patient, and really inspired us to involve in public health surveillance in our future work.

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize this course for a fellow student? Would you recommend it to another student? Why or why not?
comments: recommended
If you really interested in surveillance, then it is a really great course for you to take.
The course gives a good overview of public health surveillance methodology and data analysis.
I would recommend this class to a fellow student I think its subject matter is important
Covered the basics of surveillance in the first half of the course and in the second half described surveillance of specific health conditions in detail
This course is very helpful. I will recommend to another student.
